pullrequest.title: Add ability to control camera via messages

content.raw: I think having the private implementations outside of the main header file is good, and the private headers should not be installed too because we don't want to expose them to the users.  `Event.hh` was an exception because it's composed of templates which are hard to separate out.
content.html: I think having the private implementations outside of the main header file is good, and the private headers should not be installed too because we don't want to expose them to the users. Event.hh was an exception because it's composed of templates which are hard to separate out.
